review: Easy setup and loving the quality / images projected to my LED TV. I would like to give it a 5 star but I'm still having trouble trying to solve the 'no audio / volume' issue which quite a handful of users had reported, as my LED TV is an old model and only has 01 HDMI port and limited settings that can be tweaked. I'll update again if I manage to get that issue solved.
author: F. SUE

review: awesome little gadget!! from YouTube to Pandora, the chromecast streams everything to your big screen. you can even web browse on your TV if you use a Google chrome web browser. Netflix quality is also amazing!! certainly worth the $35.
author: L C

review: excellent vendor, not so top notch of a product.  Casting over wifi is weak and glitch filled so much I can't watch 30 minutes of anything beginning to end.
author: David Ducolon

review: Does the job. Waiting for Intel WiDi to come out next year on Skylake chip.
author: Jack M

review: Couldn't wait to get it and then it totally met my expectations
author: Indera Gibson

review: Only lasted 8 months before dying and there is no warranty.

review: This is great!! I use it almost every day
author: Cathy Thomas

review: This is 35 dollars everywhere of Coarse its hdmi all of them are why would I pay 50 after shipping for something I can get walking into walmart. ..I own this it is wonderful I use it everyday but don't gyp people of their money :/
